secondaries.shortDescription: Score points based on what hapenned in the round (objectives, units destroyed, CHARACTER destroyed)

subObjectives.description: You control more objective markers than your opponent.
More enemy units were destroyed by ranged attacks made by EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units from your army this battle round than vice vers
More enemy units were destroyed by melee attacks made by EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units from your army this battle round than vice versa.
More enemy CHARACTER units were destroyed by attacks made by EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER units from your army this battle round than vice versa.
